title: Zscaler Internet Access - Firewall
description: This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into firewall logs from Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA).

definition.content:
[Zscaler Internet Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-internet-access) (ZIA) is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud.

This dashboard delivers a centralized view of firewall-related traffic and security events as observed through Zscaler Internet Access. It enables security and network teams to monitor, analyze, and respond to firewall activity with deep visibility into event trends, threat detections, and policy enforcement outcomes.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/z-scaler/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: User Information and Zscaler Client Connector Device Information
